definition: plot elevation based on a digital elevation model (DGM) with 1 m grid cell width [m.a.s.l.]
management as binary value: extensively used (1) or unused (0)
flower cover as share of total plot area (60 x 60 m) [%]
host plant species richness per plot
aggregated cover of all host plant species per plot [%]
daily mean temperature averaged over the summer months (May - September) per year [°C]
daily mean temperature averaged over the whole year [°C]
